messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1974
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/21/02 6:34:32 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/21/02 6:34:32 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
However, vegetarian is well defined and one coming to a vegetarian list
would be hard put not to know what a vegetarian is. >>


I have been a vegetarian/mostly vegetarian for almost 10 years and constantly
get the "but you eat chicken and fish don't you?" question.
Apparently not everyone has well defined ideas of what vegetarian is/isn't.

And at this list, it has been defined in the welcome note.

Ren
